name: Ancient Avarice
description:
Enter a temple full of risks and riches as you attempt to claim the treasure and make it out in one piece. Use your trusty sidearm to rid the temple of greedy graverobbers and pesky skeletons, avoid traps and pitfalls, and then make it out again with the treasure.

In Ancient Avarice the player will engage in brutal combat with skeletons and graverobbers and dodge deadly traps like snake pits, dart traps and crushers in an attempt to capture the Lost Idol of Avarice. The player has to be skillful to avoid taking damage. The perceptive player can find hidden rooms and treasures along the way.
